reviewText: As a longtime VW enthusiast, I was excited to see this available.  It was worth every penny!  The only better thing would have been to actually be there...maybe someday...

I'm a huge VW fan. My first car was a VW bug & my last will probably be one too. This is very cool--you get to see a ton of creatively customized VWs, and you get to hear so many cool stories that are almost as fascinating as the cars. I like to think of us VW enthusiasts as one big wacky family...so it was cool to see all the other nuts out there like myself
Having been to this festival in person I can attest to what a great experience it is. This video captures it to a tee. Really cool to watch just to see how much I missed!
